static/dash/lib/components/Wordcloud.rea.description:
Wordcloud is a wrapper component for react-wordcloud usage by dash.
It takes a property, `data`, containing a series of words and a series of weights and displays a wordcloud
or group of wordclouds depending on whether a `group` value has been specified.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

data.description: Server-side data containing words "data[group].x" and weights "data[group][y-prop]".

y.description: List of properties to use as weights.

group.description: List of properties to use as groups.
